content: hi I registered https://github.com/roc-lang/roc/issues/5490 when I could find older release of roc ? I recall that is used to work some time ago
I verified this on two linux machines so it is not specific hardware related

I only started keeping old nightlies since yesterday, so I only have them going back to 05-26.
I can test this issue by building from source, is there a specific date or commit you would like me to try?
@Anton as suggested by you, I am using --linker-legacy and now it works, so no such a big deal for now
